400.description: Password must be at least 8 characters long

get.description:
Verify a user's email address using a verification token.

Args:
    token: Email verification token
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Message indicating verification status

Raises:
    HTTPException: If token is invalid or expired

post.description:
Request a password reset link.

Args:
    data: Password reset request data containing email
    background_tasks: FastAPI background tasks handler
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Message indicating reset link has been sent (if email exists)

Reset a user's password using a reset token.

Args:
    data: Password reset confirmation data including token and new password
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Message indicating password reset status

Raises:
    HTTPException: If token is invalid or expired

Set up two-factor authentication for a user.

Args:
    db: Database session
    user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    Two-factor setup response with secret and OTP URL

Verify and enable two-factor authentication.

Args:
    data: Two-factor verification data containing token
    db: Database session
    user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    Message indicating 2FA status

Raises:
    HTTPException: If 2FA is not set up or token is invalid

403.description: Not enough permissions to access this resource
Not enough permissions to access this resource
Not enough permissions to access this resource
Not enough permissions to access this resource

put.description:
Update a user's profile information.

Args:
    data: Profile update data
    db: Database session
    user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    Updated user information

post.description:
Deactivate a user's account.

Args:
    db: Database session
    user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    Message indicating account deactivation status

Generate a new API key for a user.

Args:
    db: Database session
    user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    Newly generated API key

get.description: Check database health and return basic statistics.

Run comprehensive database diagnostics.
Only available to admin users.

Get current migration status.
Only available to admin users.

post.description:
Create a new database migration.
Only available to admin users.

Upgrade database to specified revision.
Only available to admin users.

get.description:
Get a list of notifications.

Args:
    user_id: Optional filter by user ID
    limit: Maximum number of notifications to return

Returns:
    List of notifications

schema.title: Response List Notifications V1 Notifications Get

post.description:
Create a new notification.

Args:
    notification: Notification data

Returns:
    Created notification

403.description: You don't have permission to create notifications for other users

get.description:
Get a notification by ID.

Args:
    notification_id: Notification ID as UUID

Returns:
    Notification details

403.description: You don't have permission to view this notification

put.description:
Mark a notification as read.

Args:
    notification_id: Notification ID

Returns:
    Updated notification

403.description: You don't have permission to update this notification

500.description: Failed to mark notification as read
